alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 9:45PM CDT until May 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DENTON COUNTY... At 945 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sanger, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Frisco, Denton, Sanger, Little Elm, Prosper, Celina, Krum, Pilot Point, Aubrey, Krugerville, Cross Roads, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Oak Point, Lincoln Park, Providence Village, Lake Ray Roberts, Bolivar and Lewisville Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
